code: public void configureHttpClient(HttpClientBuilder clientBuilder) {     Credentials defaultcreds.     if (domain != null) {         defaultcreds = new NTCredentials(username, password, host, domain).     } else {         defaultcreds = new UsernamePasswordCredentials(username, password).     }     BasicCredentialsProvider credentialsProvider = new BasicCredentialsProvider().     credentialsProvider.setCredentials(AuthScope.ANY, defaultcreds).     clientBuilder.setDefaultCredentialsProvider(credentialsProvider). }
